content: IG publisher is creating packages in tgz format. It can contain a subdirectory "xml" which should provide schematron files. At least form the .sch extension I suppose it should contain such a file. But examining it, I only find a reference to the schematron file in the ..\temp\pages structure. For example, in the davinci-pdex package a file is contained StructureDefinition-pdex-device.sch that contains c:\temp\hl7.fhir.us.davinci-pdex#1.0.0\temp\pages\StructureDefinition-pdex-device.sch as its only contents (without linebreak).
Am I wrong or is this a structural error when creating the file? I suppose instead of copying the file the name itself is put there...
well, whoops. Obviously no one has looked at these files for a long time. Fixed next release
:+1:, thx
so is that proof enough that we can stop the charade?
well, ew can certainly declare that we don't think Frank matters ;-)
well he is a world away from both of us
All right, I'll make a motion at the next TSC meeting that Frank officially doesn't matter. I don't think it will have an issue being passed
With this much abuse, Frank must know that he's really loved :)
